= Introduction =

Emcaster is a reliable multicast library written in c#. It can be configured to use [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pragmatic_General_Multicast Pragmatic General Multicast (PGM)] for reliable multicast or regular Udp Multicast.

= Dependencies =

  * [http://www.microsoft.com/net/default.mspx .NET 2.0 or later]
  * [http://www.microsoft.com/windowsserver2003/technologies/msmq/default.mspx MSMQ 3.0] - InstallMsmq - Installs Pgm as a dependency. Not required for plain Udp Multicast.
  * Windows 2000, Windows 2003, Windows XP
  * [http://springframework.net/doc-latest/reference/html/ch13.html Common Logging from Spring]

= Features =
  * EmcasterTopics with Regex based Matching
  * Unmatched Performance - Over 700 thousand messages per second on commodity hardware with a gigabit network. See PerformanceTuning.
  * Reliable, In-Order Multicast with PGM - WhyPgm
  * UDP Support - Cross platform support through the Java api.
